description: Read Slack conversations, threads, user info, and search messages from your MCP client.

SLACK_USER_TOKEN.description: Slack User OAuth Token (starts with xoxp-). Get from https://api.slack.com/apps

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-). Alternative to user token.

SLACK_WORKSPACE_URL.description: Your Slack workspace URL (e.g., https://your-company.slack.com). Required for generating message links.
